entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is described as a person who is snarling and sneering at Harry. He is also referred to as 'cousin' by Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as a person who is brave and not afraid of Dudley's wand. He is also referred to as 'brave at night' by Dudley.

entities.name: daddy
entities.description: Dad is mentioned as someone that Dudley will tell about Harry having a thing out.

relationships.description: Harry is described as being braver than Dudley, who is afraid of Harry's wand at night.
Dudley is described as being afraid of Harry's wand at night.
